author: andyc
msg: Added grammar resolver to XMLParser and propagated the reference
to the components that need to use it.
Modified XMLDTDScanner to call directly to the DTDGrammar to
populate the grammar information, which in turn calls to the
parser so that it can expose the DTD information through various
APIs. After XMLDTDScanner is finished scanning the DTD, it puts
the DTDGrammar into the grammar repository so that it can be
used for validation by the validator.

author: andyc
msg: Initial changes to add DTD grammar. More to come.
